title: Just think, there is some executive team that oversaw this whole project and thought they nailed it
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvvZaBf9QQI

if you filmed me, shiting in my hand, and clapping like a seal on a sugar high, it would produce a better film than this. Like did they even play the games or watch the cartoons first? This is going to be the most anticipated dumpster fire of the year.
